<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> went<S>4198</S> unto<S>1519</S> the mount<S>3735</S> of Olives<S>1636</S>.
And<S>1161</S> early in the morning<S>3722</S> he came<S>3854</S> again<S>3825</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> the people<S>2992</S> came<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> he sat down<S>2523</S>, and taught<S>1321</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the scribes<S>1122</S> and<S>2532</S> Pharisees<S>5330</S> brought<S>71</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S> a woman<S>1135</S> taken<S>2638</S> in<S>1722</S> adultery<S>3430</S>; and<S>2532</S> when they had set<S>2476</S> her<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S>,
They say<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Master<S>1320</S>, this<S>3778</S> woman<S>1135</S> was taken<S>2638</S> in adultery<S>3431</S>, in the very act<S>1888</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> Moses<S>3475</S> in<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S> commanded<S>1781</S> us<S>2254</S>, that such<S>5108</S> should be stoned<S>3036</S>: but<S>3767</S> what<S>5101</S> sayest<S>3004</S> thou<S>4771</S>?
<S>1161</S> This<S>5124</S> they said<S>3004</S>, tempting<S>3985</S> him<S>846</S>, that<S>2443</S> they might have<S>2192</S> to accuse<S>2723</S> him<S>846</S>. But<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> stooped<S>2955</S> down<S>2736</S>, and with his finger<S>1147</S> wrote<S>1125</S> on<S>1519</S> the ground<S>1093</S>, as though he heard<S>4364</S> them not<S>3361</S>.
So<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> they continued<S>1961</S> asking<S>2065</S> him<S>846</S>, he lifted up himself<S>352</S>, and said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, He that is without sin<S>361</S> among you<S>5216</S>, let him<S>906</S> first<S>4413</S> cast<S>906</S> a stone<S>3037</S> at<S>1909</S> her<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S> he stooped<S>2955</S> down<S>2736</S>, and wrote<S>1125</S> on<S>1519</S> the ground<S>1093</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they which heard<S>191</S> it,<S>2532</S> being convicted<S>1651</S> by<S>5259</S> their own conscience<S>4893</S>, went out<S>1831</S> one by one<S>1527</S>, beginning<S>756</S> at<S>575</S> the eldest<S>4245</S>, even unto<S>2193</S> the last<S>2078</S>: and<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> was left<S>2641</S> alone<S>3441</S>, and<S>2532</S> the woman<S>1135</S> standing<S>2476</S> in<S>1722</S> the midst<S>3319</S>.
When<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had lifted up himself<S>352</S>, and<S>2532</S> saw<S>2300</S> none<S>3367</S> but<S>4133</S> the woman<S>1135</S>, he said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Woman<S>1135</S>, where<S>4226</S> are<S>1526</S> those<S>1565</S> thine<S>4675</S> accusers<S>2725</S>? hath<S>2632</S> no man<S>3762</S> condemned<S>2632</S> thee<S>4571</S>?
<S>1161</S> She said<S>2036</S>, No man<S>3762</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>. And<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Neither<S>3761</S> do<S>2632</S> I<S>1473</S> condemn<S>2632</S> thee<S>4571</S>: go<S>4198</S>, and<S>2532</S> sin<S>264</S> no more<S>3371</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> spake<S>2980</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> again<S>3825</S> unto them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the light<S>5457</S> of the world<S>2889</S>: he that followeth<S>190</S> me<S>1698</S> shall<S>4043</S> not<S>3364</S> walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4653</S>, but<S>235</S> shall have<S>2192</S> the light<S>5457</S> of life<S>2222</S>.
The Pharisees<S>5330</S> therefore<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> bearest record<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> thyself<S>4572</S>; thy<S>4675</S> record<S>3141</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> true<S>227</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Though<S>2579</S> I<S>1473</S> bear record<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> myself<S>1683</S>, yet my<S>3450</S> record<S>3141</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>: for<S>3754</S> I know<S>1492</S> whence<S>4159</S> I came<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> whither<S>4226</S> I go<S>5217</S>; but<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> cannot<S>3756</S> tell<S>1492</S> whence<S>4159</S> I come<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> whither<S>4226</S> I go<S>5217</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> judge<S>2919</S> after<S>2596</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>; I<S>1473</S> judge<S>2919</S> no<S>3756</S> man<S>3762</S>.
And<S>1161</S> yet<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> I<S>1473</S> judge<S>2919</S>, my<S>1699</S> judgment<S>2920</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>: for<S>3754</S> I am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> alone<S>3441</S>, but<S>235</S> I<S>1473</S> and<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S>.
<S>2532</S> It is<S>1125</S> also<S>1161</S> written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5212</S> law<S>3551</S>, that<S>3754</S> the testimony<S>3141</S> of two<S>1417</S> men<S>444</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>.
I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> one that bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> myself<S>1683</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S> beareth witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said they<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Where<S>4226</S> is<S>2076</S> thy<S>4675</S> Father<S>3962</S>? Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, Ye<S>1492</S> neither<S>3777</S> know<S>1492</S> me<S>1691</S>, nor<S>3777</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>: if<S>1487</S> ye had known<S>1492</S> me<S>1691</S>,<S>2532</S> ye should have known<S>1492</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> also<S>302</S>.
These<S>5023</S> words<S>4487</S> spake<S>2980</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> in<S>1722</S> the treasury<S>1049</S>, as he taught<S>1321</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S>: and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> laid hands<S>4084</S> on him<S>846</S>; for<S>3754</S> his<S>846</S> hour<S>5610</S> was<S>2064</S> not yet<S>3768</S> come<S>2064</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> again<S>3825</S> unto them<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> go my way<S>5217</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye shall seek<S>2212</S> me<S>3165</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall die<S>599</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> sins<S>266</S>: whither<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> go<S>5217</S>, ye<S>5210</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> come<S>2064</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>, Will he kill<S>3385</S> <S>615</S> himself<S>1438</S>? because<S>3754</S> he saith<S>3004</S>, Whither<S>3699</S> I<S>1473</S> go<S>5217</S>, ye<S>5210</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> come<S>2064</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> from<S>1537</S> beneath<S>2736</S>; I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> from<S>1537</S> above<S>507</S>: ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>; I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>.
I said<S>2036</S> therefore<S>3767</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye shall die<S>599</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> sins<S>266</S>: for<S>1063</S> if<S>3362</S> ye believe<S>4100</S> not<S>3362</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he, ye shall die<S>599</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> sins<S>266</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said they<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Who<S>5101</S> art<S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S>? And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Even<S>3748</S> <S>2532</S> the same that I said<S>2980</S> unto you<S>5213</S> from the beginning<S>746</S>.
I have<S>2192</S> many things<S>4183</S> to say<S>2980</S> and<S>2532</S> to judge<S>2919</S> of<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S>: but<S>235</S> he that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S> is<S>2076</S> true<S>227</S>; and I<S>2504</S> speak<S>3004</S> to<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S> those things<S>5023</S> which<S>3739</S> I have heard<S>191</S> of<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S>.
They understood<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> he spake<S>3004</S> to them<S>846</S> of the Father<S>3962</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto them<S>846</S>, When<S>3752</S> ye have lifted up<S>5312</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of man<S>444</S>, then<S>3767</S> shall ye know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> he, and<S>2532</S> that I do<S>4160</S> nothing<S>3762</S> of<S>575</S> myself<S>1683</S>; but<S>235</S> as<S>2531</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> hath taught<S>1321</S> me<S>3165</S>, I speak<S>2980</S> these things<S>5023</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he that sent<S>3992</S> me<S>3165</S> is<S>2076</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>: the Father<S>3962</S> hath<S>863</S> not<S>3756</S> left<S>863</S> me<S>3165</S> alone<S>3441</S>; for<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> do<S>4160</S> always<S>3842</S> those things that please<S>701</S> him<S>846</S>.
As he<S>846</S> spake<S>2980</S> these words<S>5023</S>, many<S>4183</S> believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>3004</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> to<S>4314</S> those Jews<S>2453</S> which<S>3588</S> believed<S>4100</S> on him<S>846</S>, If<S>1437</S> ye<S>5210</S> continue<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>1699</S> word<S>3056</S>, then are ye<S>2075</S> my<S>3450</S> disciples<S>3101</S> indeed<S>230</S>;
And<S>2532</S> ye shall know<S>1097</S> the truth<S>225</S>, and<S>2532</S> the truth<S>225</S> shall make<S>1659</S> you<S>5209</S> free<S>1659</S>.
They answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, We be<S>2070</S> Abraham's<S>11</S> seed<S>4690</S>, and<S>2532</S> were<S>1398</S> never<S>4455</S> in bondage<S>1398</S> to any man<S>3762</S>: how<S>4459</S> sayest<S>3004</S> thou<S>4771</S>,<S>3754</S> Ye shall be made<S>1096</S> free<S>1658</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> Whosoever<S>3956</S> committeth<S>4160</S> sin<S>266</S> is<S>2076</S> the servant<S>1401</S> of sin<S>266</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the servant<S>1401</S> abideth<S>3306</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> the house<S>3614</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>: but the Son<S>5207</S> abideth<S>3306</S> <S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>.
If<S>1437</S> the Son<S>5207</S> therefore<S>3767</S> shall make<S>1659</S> you<S>5209</S> free<S>1659</S>, ye shall be<S>2071</S> free<S>1658</S> indeed<S>3689</S>.
I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> ye are<S>2075</S> Abraham's<S>11</S> seed<S>4690</S>; but<S>235</S> ye seek<S>2212</S> to kill<S>615</S> me<S>3165</S>, because<S>3754</S> my<S>1699</S> word<S>3056</S> hath<S>5562</S> no<S>3756</S> place<S>5562</S> in<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>.
I<S>1473</S> speak<S>2980</S> that which<S>3739</S> I have seen<S>3708</S> with<S>3844</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>: and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> do<S>4160</S> that<S>3767</S> which<S>3739</S> ye have seen<S>3708</S> with<S>3844</S> your<S>5216</S> father<S>3962</S>.
They answered<S>611</S> and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Abraham<S>11</S> is<S>2076</S> our<S>2257</S> father<S>3962</S>. Jesus<S>2424</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto them<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> ye were<S>2258</S> Abraham's<S>11</S> children<S>5043</S>, ye would do<S>4160</S> <S>302</S> the works<S>2041</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>.
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3568</S> ye seek<S>2212</S> to kill<S>615</S> me<S>3165</S>, a man<S>444</S> that<S>3739</S> hath told<S>2980</S> you<S>5213</S> the truth<S>225</S>, which<S>3739</S> I have heard<S>191</S> of<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S>: this<S>5124</S> did<S>4160</S> not<S>3756</S> Abraham<S>11</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> do<S>4160</S> the deeds<S>2041</S> of your<S>5216</S> father<S>3962</S>. Then<S>3767</S> said they<S>2036</S> to him<S>846</S>, We<S>2249</S> be<S>1080</S> not<S>3756</S> born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> fornication<S>4202</S>; we have<S>2192</S> one<S>1520</S> Father<S>3962</S>, even God<S>2316</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> <S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, If<S>1487</S> God<S>2316</S> were<S>2258</S> your<S>5216</S> Father<S>3962</S>, ye would<S>302</S> love<S>25</S> me<S>1691</S>: for<S>1063</S> I<S>1473</S> proceeded forth<S>1831</S> and<S>2532</S> came<S>2240</S> from<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>; neither<S>3761</S> <S>1063</S> came I<S>2064</S> of<S>575</S> myself<S>1683</S>, but<S>235</S> he<S>1565</S> sent<S>649</S> me<S>3165</S>.
Why<S>1302</S> do ye<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> understand<S>1097</S> my<S>1699</S> speech<S>2981</S>? even because<S>3754</S> ye cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> hear<S>191</S> my<S>1699</S> word<S>3056</S>.
Ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> of<S>1537</S> your father<S>3962</S> the devil<S>1228</S>, and<S>2532</S> the lusts<S>1939</S> of your<S>5216</S> father<S>3962</S> ye will<S>2309</S> do<S>4160</S>. He<S>1565</S> was<S>2258</S> a murderer<S>443</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>, and<S>2532</S> abode<S>2476</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> the truth<S>225</S>, because<S>3754</S> there is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> truth<S>225</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>. When<S>3752</S> he speaketh<S>2980</S> a lie<S>5579</S>, he speaketh<S>2980</S> of<S>1537</S> his own<S>2398</S>: for<S>3754</S> he is<S>2076</S> a liar<S>5583</S>, and<S>2532</S> the father<S>3962</S> of it<S>846</S>. <sup>of his own: or, from his own will or disposition</sup>
And<S>1161</S> because<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> tell<S>3004</S> you the truth<S>225</S>, ye believe<S>4100</S> me<S>3427</S> not<S>3756</S>.
Which<S>5101</S> of<S>1537</S> you<S>5216</S> convinceth<S>1651</S> me<S>3165</S> of<S>4012</S> sin<S>266</S>? And<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> I say<S>3004</S> the truth<S>225</S>, why<S>1302</S> do<S>4100</S> ye<S>5210</S> not<S>3756</S> believe<S>4100</S> me<S>3427</S>?
He that is<S>5607</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S> heareth<S>191</S> God's<S>2316</S> words<S>4487</S>: ye<S>5210</S> therefore<S>5124</S> <S>1223</S> hear<S>191</S> them not<S>3756</S>, because<S>3754</S> ye are<S>2075</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> answered<S>611</S> the Jews<S>2453</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Say<S>3004</S> we<S>2249</S> not<S>3756</S> well<S>2573</S> that<S>3754</S> thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> a Samaritan<S>4541</S>, and<S>2532</S> hast<S>2192</S> a devil<S>1140</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, I<S>1473</S> have<S>2192</S> not<S>3756</S> a devil<S>1140</S>; but<S>235</S> I honour<S>5091</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye<S>5210</S> do dishonour<S>818</S> me<S>3165</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> seek<S>2212</S> not<S>3756</S> mine own<S>3450</S> glory<S>1391</S>: there is<S>2076</S> one that seeketh<S>2212</S> and<S>2532</S> judgeth<S>2919</S>.
Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, If<S>1437</S> a man<S>5100</S> keep<S>5083</S> my<S>1699</S> saying<S>3056</S>, he shall<S>2334</S> never<S>3364</S> <S>1519</S> <S>165</S> see<S>2334</S> death<S>2288</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Now<S>3568</S> we know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> thou hast<S>2192</S> a devil<S>1140</S>. Abraham<S>11</S> is dead<S>599</S>, and<S>2532</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>; and<S>2532</S> thou<S>4771</S> sayest<S>3004</S>, If<S>1437</S> a man<S>5100</S> keep<S>5083</S> my<S>3450</S> saying<S>3056</S>, he shall<S>1089</S> never<S>3364</S> <S>1519</S> <S>165</S> taste<S>1089</S> of death<S>2288</S>.
Art<S>3361</S> <S>1488</S> thou<S>4771</S> greater than<S>3187</S> our<S>2257</S> father<S>3962</S> Abraham<S>11</S>, which<S>3748</S> is dead<S>599</S>? and<S>2532</S> the prophets<S>4396</S> are dead<S>599</S>: whom<S>5101</S> makest<S>4160</S> thou<S>4771</S> thyself<S>4572</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S>, If<S>1437</S> I<S>1473</S> honour<S>1392</S> myself<S>1683</S>, my<S>3450</S> honour<S>1391</S> is<S>2076</S> nothing<S>3762</S>: it is<S>2076</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> that honoureth<S>1392</S> me<S>3165</S>; of whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> say<S>3004</S>, that<S>3754</S> he is<S>2076</S> your<S>5216</S> God<S>2316</S>:
Yet<S>2532</S> ye have<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> known<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>; but<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> know<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> I should say<S>2036</S>,<S>3754</S> I know<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>, I shall be<S>2071</S> a liar<S>5583</S> like<S>3664</S> unto you<S>5216</S>: but<S>235</S> I know<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> keep<S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> saying<S>3056</S>.
Your<S>5216</S> father<S>3962</S> Abraham<S>11</S> rejoiced<S>21</S> to<S>2443</S> see<S>1492</S> my<S>1699</S> day<S>2250</S>: and<S>2532</S> he saw<S>1492</S> it, and<S>2532</S> was glad<S>5463</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Thou art<S>2192</S> not yet<S>3768</S> fifty<S>4004</S> years old<S>2094</S>, and<S>2532</S> hast thou seen<S>3708</S> Abraham<S>11</S>?
Jesus<S>2424</S> said<S>2036</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, Before<S>4250</S> Abraham<S>11</S> was<S>1096</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> took they up<S>142</S> stones<S>3037</S> to<S>2443</S> cast<S>906</S> at<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> hid himself<S>2928</S>, and<S>2532</S> went<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> the temple<S>2411</S>, going<S>1330</S> through<S>1223</S> the midst<S>3319</S> of them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> so<S>3779</S> passed by<S>3855</S>.
